items.title: A dead whale shows up on your beach. What do you do with the 40-ton carcass?
bullets: ‚Ä¢ When a whale dies, its body descends to the bottom of the deep sea in a transformative phenomenon called a whale fall
‚Ä¢ An estimated 20,000 whales are fatally hit each year; sometimes a ship captain rolls into harbor unaware a 40-ton body is draped across their bow
‚Ä¢ Mass whale deaths have been linked to marine heatwaves and the toxic algae blooms that follow
